name: Gamer
description: Optimized gaming setup with Steam, Discord, and performance tweaks. Play Windows games on Linux with Proton support.
longDescription: The Gamer profile sets up your Linux machine for the best possible gaming experience. Thanks to Proton and Steam Play, you can play thousands of Windows games on Linux. This setup includes Steam with all necessary drivers and libraries, Discord for voice chat with friends, and a web browser for guides and streaming. Performance optimizations ensure smooth gameplay, and the entire setup works out of the box.

seo.title: Gaming on Linux Setup | OmniSet
seo.description: Set up the ultimate Linux gaming rig with OmniSet. Steam, Proton, Discord, and optimized drivers. Play thousands of games on Linux.
